content: pattern is written using u s terminology the snowflake flower pattern consists of 9 rounds and of four levels the stamens narrow petals large petals bottom leaves if you want to make a brooch from this snowflake you can also crochet a circle that covers the back crochet skill level is advanced it is better to crochet from yarn that holds shape well in the finished product from soft yarn the snowflake will also be soft starching or similar processing may be required if you crochet loosely it is better to crochet with a thinner hook
